item.description:
Jamaica Plain Open Studios showcases work by both emerging and established artists. It is a great opportunity to see art, meet artists, see where art work is created, explore JP, and support local artists!

We'll meet in the courtyard of the Brewery Complex at 2:00pm and then start to wander to other studio spots at 2:30.

Make sure to check the weather and dress for it. Parking may be limited-- public transit is recommended. Here is more detailed information (studio & artist names, maps, transportaion & parking info):

JP Open Studios - official site

If you RSVP maybe, please remember to update it closer to the date. This helps me know who to expect. It's also extremely helpful to add a photo that looks like you to your profile.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing an aqua pashmina scarf.
item.name: Jamaica Plain Open Studios
